text: tavada madyan(vasin) veta ovunge sahodara suayib va da (evvemu.) mage samuhayani ! numbala allahta vandanamanaya karanu. numbalata ohu hæra venat kisidu deviyeku nomæta. numbalage paramadhipatigen pæhædili sadhakayak numbala veta pæmina æta. ebævin numbala kirum minum purnavat karanu. janayata ovunge bhanda vala adu padu nokaranu. tavada mahapolova sækasu pasu va ehi kalahakam nokaranu. numbala visvasavantayin va sitiyehu nam eya numbalata srestha vanne yæyi ohu pævasuveya
